NPC.name: Zetamorph
NPC.description: An imposing yet sexy humanoid dark blue skinned figure standing seven feet tall, with her secondary set of arms adding another 2-3 feet atop that. Every limb of hers from her segmented tail to her four arms ends in sharp claws or blades. Her feminine build and lethality makes her a special kind of deadly sexy. While clad in not a shred of clothing her smooth skin gives way in places to dark blueblack chitinous armour that hugs her curves tightly.
